The Five Impossible Tasks - The Swallow's Cowrie
Les 5 défis : coquillage cauri de l’hirondelle
Die 5 Herausforderungen, die Kaurisschnecke der Schwalbe
Le 5 prove - Ciprea di rondine
Los 5 desafíos: Cauri de la golondrina
五つの難題・燕の子安貝
다섯가지 난제, 제비의 자패
The Five Impossible Tasks - The Swallow's Cowrie
五道難題：燕子的子安貝
五道難題：燕子的子安貝
The Swallow's Cowrie
kDesc
A cowrie said to be born by swallows.\n For reasons unknown, when swallows give birth they will also give birth to cowries occassionally.[#Legal]
Coquillage cauri, pondu par une hirondelle.\nLes hirondelles donnent parfois naissance à des cauris.[#Legal]
Eine Kaurisschnecke, die von einer Schwalbe geboren wurde. \nWenn Schwalben Kinder gebären, gebären sie manchmal Kaurisschnecken.[#Legal]
Ciprea nata da una rondine.\nDurante il parto, alcune volte le rondini generano una ciprea. [#Legal]
Una cauri que nació de una golondrina.\nCuando las golondrinas engendran caracoles.[#Legal]
燕が生んだとされる子安貝。\n燕が子を生む時に、何故か生むことがあるという。[#Legal]
제비가 낳았다고 하는 자패.\n제비가 새끼를 낳을 때, 왠지 모르게 낳았다고 한다.[#Legal]
A cowrie said to be born by swallows.\n For reasons unknown, when swallows give birth they will also give birth to cowries occassionally.[#Legal]
據說是燕子生出來的子安貝。\n當燕子生育下一代時，有時亦會生下子安貝，原因不明。[#Legal]
據說是燕子生出來的子安貝。\n當燕子生育下一代時，有時亦會生下子安貝，原因不明。[#Legal]
A cowrie said to be born by swallows.\n For reasons unknown, when swallows give birth they will also give birth to cowries occassionally.[#Legal]
